title: GameStop, Meme Stocks Hit by Market Turmoil
sub_head: AMC Entertainment, GameStop both drop more than 6% amid volatile day in broad market
body:
Shares of GameStop Corp. , AMC Entertainment Holdings and other meme stocks numbered among the hardest hit by Mondayâ€™s market turmoil, the latest blow to the favorite bets of many online day traders.
Videogame retailer GameStop and movie theater operator AMC fell around 6% and 7% respectively Monday, outpacing broader stock-market declines before major indexes turned higher in late trading. The drops extended a slump that has dragged down GameStop shares by one-third this year, while AMC shares have lost about 40% during the same period.
